## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse] object to specify whether your app is able to cancel a workout. The response object contains only the status code that indicates whether to launch your app or whether there was a problem.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] methods of your cancel workout handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling].

# INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse

**Class**

Your app’s response to a cancel workout intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse] object to specify whether your app is able to cancel a workout. The response object contains only the status code that indicates whether to launch your app or whether there was a problem.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] methods of your cancel workout handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling].

## Initializing the Response Object

- **init(code:userActivity:)**: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

## Getting the Response Code

- **code**: The code that indicates whether you successfully handled the intent.
- **INCancelWorkoutIntentResponseCode**: Constants that indicate the response state.

## Cancel a Workout

- **INCancelWorkoutIntentHandling**: The interface that handles requests to cancel a workout.
- **INCancelWorkoutIntent**: A request to cancel an active workout.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResponse

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
